review: I purchased this for bedroom TV, and, its fabulous!!! Set up was easy, getting batteries in back of remote, OMG not so much. I also have remote on my I phone, and works fine!!  I was going to get another fire stick for My Family room TV, but, now thinking  I might get the fire TV for it.
author: Nancy McCabe

review: I would recommend it to anyone. I find myself using my Fire Stick more than my cable box!
author: Robert J. Guarini sr.

review: extremely happy with my purchaseit beat my expectations
author: Sherry linden

review: The fire stick is great and I enjoy movies at home even more through Amazon.
author: TriciaLee

review: We love our Fire Stick! We use it a lot and get great access to thousands of shows and movies. Highly recommend.
author: Randy Stevens

review: Super easy to hook up and start using. Really pretty amazing for a great price.
author: Sober Boss

review: Perfect for bedroom TV to watch Netflix or Prime Videos
author: Randall J Britto

review: The Fire stick exceed my expectations, easy install and love the access to music, movies, and other media.
author: Bobby Carter
